mapper.select: select ifnull((select rate_star from rate where rate_user_id=#{userId} and rate_movie_id=#{movieId}), 0) status_rate, (select count(*) from comment where comment_user_id=#{userId} and comment_movie_id=#{movieId})>0 status_is_comment, (select count(*) from watching where watching_user_id=#{userId} and watching_movie_id=#{movieId})>0 status_is_watching, (select count(*) from wish where wish_user_id=#{userId} and wish_movie_id=#{movieId})>0 status_is_wish from dual
mapper.delete: delete from rate where rate_movie_id = #{movieId} and rate_user_id = #{userId}
delete from wish where wish_movie_id = #{movieId} and wish_user_id = #{userId}
delete from watching where watching_movie_id = #{movieId} and watching_user_id = #{userId}
